comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: NYT of November 11, 1914 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F6071FFC3C5C13738... "HARTMAN SEIZED IN $700000 FRAUD; Ex-President of Tyson ... Richard J. Hartman, the former President of Tyson Co., ticket brokers, who got into legal entanglements last year through transactions in Metropolitan Opera tickets, was arrested yesterday afternoon on a charge by Mrs. Charlotte L. Mackenzie that he had stolen her entire fortune, approximating $700,000, and two diamond rings valued at $1,000 each."

comment.author: 33593953@N02
comment._content: Thanks for the full name and information. I notice the New York Sun used a similar photo in its coverage: chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn83030272/1914-11-12/ed-... . We'll add information to the description when we update.
